title: Adizero EVO SL Shoes
schema_description:
Inspired by the record-breaking EVO 1, the Adizero EVO SL shoes designed for those who crave versatility in their running gear. Whether you're racing or training, they deliver a lightweight experience so you can move forward with ease. 

Light Makes Fast. adidas LightstrikePro provides super-light cushioning, plus energy return for next-level speed. A regular fit and lace closure offer a secure and comfortable feel, while the textile and synthetic upper gives a snug fit. And the rubber outsole provides reliable traction, making these shoes suitable for varied terrain.

Embrace the journey and let these shoes be your partner with every stride.

title: Adizero EVO SL Shoes
schema_description: Experience the feeling of fast in the Adizero Evo SL. Inspired by the innovation of record-breaking shoes in the Adizero running family - and specifically the Pro Evo 1 - the Evo SL is designed for you to run in it, or not. Combining Adizero technology with a bold and unique racing-inspired aesthetic, it's an evolution of speed in all aspects of life. A responsive layer of LIGHTSTRIKE PRO foam in the midsole provides comfort and cushioning for optimal energy return.

title: Galaxy 7 Running Shoes
schema_description: Every run is a journey of discovery. Lace up in these adidas running shoes and explore your potential. The Cloudfoam midsole cushions your stride to keep you comfortable as you build endurance. A durable textile upper offers a supportive feel from your first laps to your first 5K.

title: Duramo SL 2 Running Shoes
schema_description: You signed up for your first race. Now it's time to train. As you build consistency, speed and endurance, these adidas running shoes support you — one run at a time. They're light and stable with a breezy mesh upper and a full-length LIGHTMOTION midsole that responds to your stride. A durable Adiwear outsole grips the pavement or track.

title: Runfalcon 5 Running Shoes
schema_description: From the track to the treadmill, run toward your goals in these running shoes from adidas. The cushy Cloudfoam midsole feels soft and supportive from the minute you step in. A breathable mesh upper and durable Adiwear outsole make these go-to trainers perfect for all-day wear.

title: Adizero SL 2 Shoes
schema_description: Running is a way to discover what you're capable of, and these adidas running shoes are tuned to help you do just that. The Lightstrike Pro midsole is resilient, responsive and comfortable — designed to keep you moving at top speed for the duration of your run. The mono mesh upper is lightweight and breathable, so you stay comfortable as the miles roll by.

title: Adizero Adios Pro 4 Shoes
schema_description: Proven to be the world's most winning shoe, the Adizero Adios Pro line is the pinnacle of Adizero Racing shoes. The Adios Pro 4 is made for fast runners who want to experience faster, with enhanced features designed to optimize running efficiency. Our carbon-infused ENERGYRODS 2.0 provide a seamless transition from heel to toe for a snappy, efficient stride. In the midsole, a new rocker point offers improved running economy. A double layer of our best-in-class ultralight LIGHTSTRIKE PRO ensures cushioning for every quick stride you take, helping you maintain energy over the long term. The shoe rides on an outsole built with Continental™ rubber for a no-slip transition during toe-off, as well as LIGHTTRAXION, designed to reduce weight without sacrificing grip.

title: 4DFWD 4 Shoes
schema_description:
Another step. Another block. Another mile. These adidas running shoes help you move forward, stride by stride. While the soft, breathable upper wraps your foot in comfort and support, a 3D-printed adidas 4D midsole that's coded for forward momentum helps create a smooth, gliding experience. It all rides on a grippy rubber outsole.

By choosing recycled, we are able to reuse materials that have already been created, which helps to reduce waste. Renewable materials choices will help us to remove our reliance on finite resources. Our products made with a blend of recycled and renewable materials feature at least 20% total of these materials.

title: Terrex Agravic GTX Trail Running Shoes
schema_description:
Responsive and supportive, these Terrex Agravic trail running shoes are built for logging miles and adventurous days on the trail in wet, muddy conditions. A waterproof, breathable GORE-TEX membrane seals out wet conditions to keep your feet dry, and you focused on the trail ahead. Abrasion-resistant overlays add trail-proven durability, and the gusseted tongue seals out debris. A Lightstrike 2.0 midsole provides responsive cushioning for stability and comfort on rough terrain, and the rocker shape promotes a smooth roll-off for a fluid pace. The Continental™ Rubber outsole with 4 mm lugged tread maintains secure footing across roots and rocks, wet or dry.

This product features at least 20% recycled materials. By reusing materials that have already been created, we help to reduce waste and our reliance on finite resources and reduce the footprint of the products we make.

title: Duramo Speed 2 Running Shoes
schema_description:
Whether you have a 10k on your calendar or a personal running goal in sight, these adidas running shoes help you train with purpose. They're light and fast with responsive Lightstrike cushioning and a TPU outsole that offers traction on the road or track. The engineered mesh upper is breathable and supportive, so you can keep pushing your pace.

This product features at least 20% recycled materials. By reusing materials that have already been created, we help to reduce waste and our reliance on finite resources and reduce the footprint of the products we make.

title: Supernova Rise 2 Running Shoes
schema_description: You got into running, and now there's a race on your calendar. Keep making progress in these adidas running shoes for daily runs. They ride on a Dreamstrike+ midsole, our lightweight super foam tuned for comfort. Support Rods help guide you from heel strike to toe off. Our new refined engineered sandwich mesh upper and premium heel construction is elegantly designed for optimized breathability for our most comfortable fit yet. Recognized by the American Podiatric Medical Association for promoting good foot health; this is Supernova Rise 2.

title: Ultraboost 5X Shoes
schema_description:
Chasing new PRs feels easier in these adidas running shoes. Our lightest BOOST yet delivers continual energy return across the miles so you feel fresh from start to finish. Add the Torsion System between the heel and forefoot for stability and you get a smooth, steady stride no matter how far or fast you go. It all rides on a Continental™ Rubber outsole for secure traction in wet and dry conditions to keep you confident on your feet. 

This product features at least 20% recycled materials. By reusing materials that have already been created, we help to reduce waste and our reliance on finite resources and reduce the footprint of the products we make.

title: Adizero Adios Pro 4 Shoes
schema_description: Proven to be the world's most winning shoe, the Adizero Adios Pro line is the pinnacle of Adizero Racing shoes. The Adios Pro 4 is made for fast runners who want to experience faster, with enhanced features designed to optimize running efficiency. Our carbon-infused ENERGYRODS 2.0 provide a seamless transition from heel to toe for a snappy, efficient stride. In the midsole, a new rocker point offers improved running economy. A double layer of our best-in-class ultralight LIGHTSTRIKE PRO ensures cushioning for every quick stride you take, helping you maintain energy over the long term. The shoe rides on an outsole built with Continental™ rubber for a no-slip transition during toe-off, as well as LIGHTTRAXION, designed to reduce weight without sacrificing grip.

title: Terrex Agravic 3 Trail Running Shoes
schema_description: Experience a blend of comfort, durability, and stability. A breathable upper helps keep your feet feeling cool. The all-new softer Lightstrike midsole is engineered to deliver a cushioned and dynamic ride that can handle the impact from every step on the trails. With the Agravic 3 you can run every trail confidently with a Continental™ Rubber outsole with 4mm lug profile, providing reliable grip in dry and wet conditions.
